amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding the funding of the Advanced Shipbuilding Enterprise under the National Shipbuilding Research Program of the Navy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3233 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3233 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6435) To express the sense of the Senate regarding the funding of the Advanced Shipbuilding Enterprise under the National Shipbuilding Research Program of the Navy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3233 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Lott.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3233 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
